mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance ( user_id, status, attendance_time, remark ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{status}, #{attendanceTime}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE attendance SET status = #{status}, attendance_time = #{attendanceTime}, remark = #{remark}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.user_id, a.status, a.attendance_time, a.remark FROM attendance a WHERE a.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT u.id, u.name, u.sex, u.class_name, u.grade, a.status, a.attendance_time, a.remark FROM attendance a LEFT JOIN user u ON a.user_id = u.id ORDER BY u.id

SELECT u.id, u.name, u.sex, u.class_name, u.grade, a.status, a.attendance_time, a.remark FROM attendance a LEFT JOIN user u ON a.user_id = u.id WHERE 1=1 AND (grade = '25级' OR grade = '24级')
AND u.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND u.class_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{className}, '%')
AND a.status = #{status}
ORDER BY u.id
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE attendance_time >= #{startTime} AND attendance_time <= #{endTime}
